item.title: How do i make an NPC talk?
item.dc:creator: @trollromance trollromance
item.description:
@trollromance wrote:

I know what the code is i think, but idk what to change

                if (npcs[i].npcType == 1917) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "God Armor Shop!";
                    }
                }

I know i need to change the text update but what else and what do i put there?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2009, 06:24:49 am[/size][hr]Nvm i got it, thanks tho!
